column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Joined a couple of friends for dinner here last night. The restaurant was very accommodating in adding me to the reservation at the last minute (granted
column2: it was a Monday night so it wasn't very busy). The service was great
column3: the server's suggestions were very helpful. Something I ordered wasn't very good at all
column4: and the server and manager were apologetic and didn't charge us for it. My friends' steak was amazing
